SELECT c.class_id AS classId, c.class_name AS className, t.teacher_id AS teacherId, t.teacher_name AS teacherName, t.teacher_number AS teacherNumber FROM class c JOIN teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id
c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
t.teacher_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{teacherName}, '%')

SELECT c.class_id AS classId, c.class_name AS className, t.teacher_id AS teacherId, t.teacher_name AS teacherName, t.teacher_number AS teacherNumber FROM student_class sc LEFT JOIN class c on sc.class_id = c.class_id JOIN teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id WHERE sc.student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT c.class_id AS classId, c.class_name AS className, t.teacher_id AS teacherId, t.teacher_name AS teacherName, t.teacher_number AS teacherNumber FROM class c JOIN teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id WHERE c.class_id NOT IN (SELECT class_id FROM student_class WHERE student_id = #{studentId})

SELECT c.class_id AS classId, c.class_name AS className, t.teacher_id AS teacherId, t.teacher_name AS teacherName, t.teacher_number AS teacherNumber, c.value FROM class c JOIN teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id WHERE c.teacher_id = #{teacherId}
AND c.class_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT s.student_id AS studentId, s.student_name AS studentName, s.student_number AS studentNumber FROM student s WHERE s.student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM student_class WHERE class_id = #{classId})

SELECT s.student_id AS studentId, s.student_name AS studentName, s.student_number AS studentNumber FROM student s WHERE s.student_id NOT IN (SELECT student_id FROM student_class WHERE class_id = #{classId})

SELECT cs.student_id AS studentId, cs.id, cs.score, cs.reason, cs.status, s.student_name AS studentName FROM class_score cs JOIN class c ON c.class_id = cs.class_id JOIN student s ON s.student_id = cs.student_id WHERE cs.class_id = #{classId}

AND c.class_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
